articles.author: Neil Dutta
articles.title: The 7 ugly trends that show America is closer to a recession than you think - Business Insider
articles.description: From homebuilding to trucking, major parts of the US economy are in deep trouble. The weakness could drag the whole country into a recession.
articles.content: When describing the health of the US economy, there is a temptation among economists, market analysts, and politicians to argue that the only true picture of our current situation is a sweeping portr… [+8007 chars]
